caption.p: Radical-scavenging effects of DIBEt. DPPH and ABTS ( A) and superoxide and hydroxyl ( B) radical-scavenging activities of DIBEt. Ascorbic acid (ASC) and quercetin (QRC) were considered as standard antioxidant molecules. The reducing power of DIBEt was examined by CUPRAC, FRAP, and ORAC assays ( C). The ascorbic acid-equivalent antioxidant capacity was calculated for CUPRAC and FRAP assays, and ( D) the ORAC activity was expressed as the Trolox-equivalent antioxidant capacity. Mean Â± SD ( n = 3). ** p < 0.01.
